text:
My son started attending Tinkerland childcare Centre in July, and we’ve already seen so much improvement day by day. A special shoutout to Lisheng Laoshi—her dedication, warmth, and passion for teaching have made a significant impact on my child’s growth and confidence.

We’re truly fortunate to have her as his teacher!

My daughter have been attending Tinkerland for close to 6 months now and can see that she's enjoying going to school. The teachers are all very nice and friendly, especially her form teacher, Teacher June.

My boy have been attending class at Tinkerland (Jln Pari Burong) for more than 6 months now.

Although he only attends 2 hours per day, I can still gradually see improvement to his social skills and recently keep hearing him singing ABC & 123 while he is playing at home.

Thanks 🙏🏻 to all the teachers at Tinkerland for their patience.

My son is attending the pre-school and  we can see that he is enjoying to learn here. He seldom speak out outside before, but he is enjoying communication with the teachers and mates now.

The teachers are very nice and friendly. Additionally, we can closely communicate with various ways, such as in person, via WhatsApp, and via other communication app. Thank you very much!
Thank you Tinkerland ❤️ to help Trinity grow so well and allow her to be so dependent on feeding herself. Highly recommend this school to all my friends and family!! 🙆🏻‍♀️
